paper_abstract: In this work we obtain the group of conformal and anticonformal automorphisms of real cyclic p-gonal Riemann surfaces, where p >= 3 is a prime integer and the genus of the surfaces is at least (p - 1)(2) + 1. We use Fuchsian and NEC groups, and cohomology of finite groups. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On automorphisms groups of cyclic p-gonal Riemann surfaces
